text: Tumors       Extraskeletal mesenchymal chondrosarcoma     Treatment of extraskeletal mesenchymal chondrosarcoma may include the following:                -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor. Radiation therapy may be given before and/or after surgery.      -  Chemotherapy followed by surgery. Chemotherapy with or without radiation therapy is given after surgery.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.
